resources.string: This project involves creating a RESTful API for an e-commerce platform. Customers can browse, search, and order products using either Cash on Delivery (COD) or online banking, while admins manage products, process orders, and update order statuses efficiently.

" This project focuses on developing a RESTful API for an online clothing store. Customers can browse and search products using a semantic \nsearch engine, with the option to place orders via Cash on Delivery (COD) or online banking. Admins can manage products, process orders"
